mapper.select: select CNTN_ID, CNTN_OFFER_TYPE, LINK_SYS_HOST, URL, CNTN_TYPE, MASTER_ID, CNTN_JOINT_FLAG, CNTN_DESC, CNTN_RGSR_DATE, CNTN_RGSR_ID, CNTN_CHNG_DATE, CNTN_CHNG_ID, PORT_NO from nw030m

select CNTN_ID, CNTN_OFFER_TYPE, LINK_SYS_HOST, URL, CNTN_TYPE, MASTER_ID, CNTN_JOINT_FLAG, CNTN_DESC, CNTN_RGSR_DATE, CNTN_RGSR_ID, CNTN_CHNG_DATE, CNTN_CHNG_ID, PORT_NO from nw030m where CNTN_ID = #{cntnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into nw030m(CNTN_ID, CNTN_OFFER_TYPE, LINK_SYS_HOST, URL, CNTN_TYPE, MASTER_ID, CNTN_JOINT_FLAG, CNTN_DESC, CNTN_RGSR_DATE, CNTN_RGSR_ID, CNTN_CHNG_DATE, CNTN_CHNG_ID, PORT_NO) values (#{cntnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cntnOfferType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{linkSysHost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cntnType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{masterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cntnJointFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{cntnDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cntnRgsrDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{cntnRgsrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cntnChngDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{cntnChngId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{portNo,jdbcType=INTEGER})
